steps.name: Arm elevation load-routing
steps.passCriteria: Neck quiet, ribs stacked, shoulders do not hike.
steps.failCriteria: SCM/upper trap fires immediately or ribs flare hard.

steps.name: Backward step acceptance (L/R)
steps.passCriteria: Back leg accepts load quietly; no neck tension.
steps.failCriteria: Stride shortens, lumbar hinge, or anterior hip pinch.

steps.name: Single-leg quiet spine (L/R)
steps.passCriteria: Pelvis rotates over femur without spinal substitution.
steps.failCriteria: Ribs shift or lumbar twist substitutes.

steps.name: Breath probe under stack
steps.failCriteria: Chest lifts vertically or SCM engages.

adaptive.name: Adaptive branches
adaptive.notes: Branching tests based on Quick screen failures.

advanced.name: Advanced validation
advanced.notes: Stability under load and dynamic perturbation.
